newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Tupperware estimates cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Tupperware estimates cut.

text.p: -- Mesirow Financial Inc said Tuesday it reduced its 1997 earnings estimate for Tupperware Corp to $2.47 a share from $2.60 and the estimate for 1998 to $2.83 from $2.97.
-- Mesirow said the revision stemmed from worse-than-expected results in U.S. and Asian/Pacific markets and Mesirow's expectations of a continuation of the negative trends for the next six months.

-- Mesirow said U.S. markets performed poorly mostly because of Tupperware's efforts to restructure, revamp and redirect its distribution network. Sales fell 28 percent to $31.6 million, Mesirow said.
-- It could take most of 1997 and possibly into 1998 for Tupperware to turn around both the U.S. and Asian/Pacific markets and make them strong contributors, Mesirow said.
-- Tupperware makes storage and other plastic products.
-- Its shares closed off 3-3/4 Tuesday at 31-1/2.
